meanings.definition: Resembling a planet in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The large, round balloon looked planetlike as it floated in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The shiny, round ornament hanging from the tree was planetlike.
meanings.sent3: The planetlike cake with colorful layers was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a planetlike glow in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent5: The planetlike rock formation stood out against the flat landscape.
